Reviews.Title: Present for my daughter!! Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Jenny Tyner Foss
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera.It was a gift for my 12 year, who had been wanting a nicer camera.It's easy to use and she loves it.  The zoom was great!

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my daughter
Reviews.Author: Decodonna
Reviews.Content: This was a present for my 20 something daughter & she is really enjoying it. Everything was as described & it's a nice little compact digital yet it has the "bump out" in front for a secure grip.

Reviews.Title: Not exactly as pictured
Reviews.Author: Susan Porreca
Reviews.Content: The camera takes terrifc pictures, so for that, my daughter loves it.  However, when it arrived, I was disappointed that the camera bag included in the package said "Vivitar" on it - not Nikon.  Additionally, it "ate" the batteries really quickly, and I purchased a major brand of AA batteries.

ProductInfo.Name: Nikon COOLPIX L610 16MP 3.0-inch LCD Red Digital Camera Kit
